name: OCKAnyContactQuery
desc: A protocol required for contact queries, which provides customizing and sorting query results for contact data.

items.name: init(OCKAnyContactQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new contact query from a specific query.

items.name: var carePlanIDs: [String]
items.desc: An array of care plan identifiers you can use to match contacts in the query-returned results.

items.name: var sortDescriptors: [OCKContactSortDescriptor]
items.desc: The order in which you want to sort the query results.
